content: It's still too hard to find a job. And even if you have a job, chances are you're having a tougher time paying the rising costs of everything from groceries to gas.
translations: ita:È ancora troppo difficile trovare un lavoro. E anche se si ha un lavoro, è probabile che si stia attraversando un period
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by BHO (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
